content: the eunoia top pattern invites you to have fun with colour for the summer months made using cotton dk/8 ply/light/ weight yarn it uses catherine s wheel stitch and is aimed at beginner crocheters who are confident in following a pattern there are three size options with an additional suggestion for a younger child size for the tri-coloured version pictured xs i used approximately 180m red 150m peach 150m beige yarn is bendigo woollen mills 8ply cotton the pattern is worked from the bottom up in one rectangle shape then seamed together with the option of buttons at the side and neckline details added last enjoy the pattern
